mapper.select: select * from(select begin, scheduleKind, subject, num, rownum rNum from schedule) where rNum >= #{start} and rNum <= #{end}
select id, num, scheduleKind, subject, location, content, begin, end from schedule where id=#{id} and del=0
select * from schedule where id = #{id} and num = #{num} and del=0
mapper.update: update schedule set schedulekind=#{scheduleKind}, subject=#{subject}, location=#{location}, content=#{content}, begin=#{begin}, end=#{end} where num=#{num} and del=0
update schedule set del=1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from schedule where id=#{id} AND extract(year from begin) = extract(year from sysdate) AND extract(month from begin) = extract(month from sysdate) AND extract(day from begin) = extract(day from sysdate)

select * from schedule where id=#{id} AND extract(year from begin) = extract(year from sysdate) AND extract(month from begin) = extract(month from sysdate) AND extract(day from begin) = extract(day from sysdate)
mapper.insert: insert into b_manageinfo values(seq_b_manageinfo.nextval, seq_b_manage.currval, #{id}, 0, #{content}, null, 0)
mapper.select: select g.r_name, m.name, b.subject, b.groupId, b.state, b.begin, b.end, b.reg_date, b.reg_date2, b.b_name, b.content from b_manage b, member m, grade g where m.id=b.id and m.rank=g.rank and b.todonum=#{todonum} and b.del=0
select i.id, i.content, i.reg_date, i.donum, b.b_name, b.state from b_manage b, b_manageinfo i where b.todonum=i.todonum and b.todonum=#{todonum} and b.del=0
select subject, begin, end, b_name, content from b_manage where todonum=#{todonum}
mapper.update: update b_manage set b_name=#{b_name}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, begin=#{begin}, end=#{end}, reg_date2=#{reg_date2}, state=#{state}, id=#{id} where todonum=#{todonum}
update b_manage set del=1 where todonum=#{todonum}
update b_manage set state=#{state} where todonum=#{todonum}
update b_manageinfo set content=#{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_date=#{reg_date} where donum=#{donum}
mapper.select: select * from todolist where id=#{id} and del=0
